title: issue with load
body: i queued up in a match and it never loaded. the game loaded but i never went into the match. it gave me a reconnect and still would never connect. i even closed off the application and rebooted and it wouldnt connect, at one point i never even logged in, but it stated i was in game

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC is having a tough time reaching our gameservers. Since this issue is most commonly caused by specific network settings that conflict with League, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address those potential factors.

Please let me know if you still run into these issues after working through those steps.
i ended up uninstalling the entire game and reinstalling and it fixed it. a minor setback{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  but atleast i can play again{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I have had the same thing happen to me twice in the last 4 games.
